__e: I'd like to know what the hell Holden is discussing with the Captain right now.
When Holden got out, he said you had doubts he was the killer.
But you'd be wise to remember that Holden is my son.
Mrs. Holden, we can't begin to fathom the loss you've suffered.
- And Holden's name and photo didn't mean anything to the vics?
Do you think you're above it, Holden? Hmm? !
